page.title: 15HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: SITUATED IN CURRIE ROAD, THIS BUILDING IS ON WHAT WAS AT ONE TIME THE GALASHIELS RAILWAY STATION. THE RAIL LINK IN THE BORDERS CEASED IN THE 1960'S. WITHIN THE CENTRE THERE ARE FACILITIES FOR DOCTOR'S PRACTICES, HEALTHH VISITORS,COMMUNITY DENTAL SERVICES AND ANCLLARY SERVICES MANAGED BY THE BORDERS HEALTH BOARD.THERE ARE SEVEN DOCTORS WORKING IN THE CENTRE AND IN THE TOWN THERE IS ONLY ONE PRACTICE WITH TWO DOCTORS WHO OPTED NOT TO JOIN THE CENTRE. PATIENTS ARE REGISTERED WITH A 'PRACTICE'OF DOCTORS EACH HAVING A SUITE OF ROOMS AND WAITING AREA IN THE CENTRE.THE ONE RECEPTION SERVES ALL DOCTORS. THE INTERIOR DECOR IS MOST ATTRACTIVE WITH PLANTS,PAINTINGS,AND COMFORTABLE CHAIRS IN THE FOYER.
